Title: Trinket Bandits
Description:
The gnolls have quite a collection of trinkets. Tuskarr trinkets. They have either stolen them from our villages, or worse, from the brave tuskarr that fell in battle against them. These trinkets are our heritage and should reside with us.

If you bring some back to me, I will teach you the techniques that are used to make them.
ObjectivesText: Gather 10 Stolen Trinkets from the gnolls of the Dragon Isles for Temnaayu of the Iskaara Tuskarr.
